reviewText: this review is for the "Sailor Moon Limited Edition Box Set II" DVD.this is a BOOTLEG(unlicensed/unauthorized) release of Sailor Moon. this last season of Sailor Moon(called "Sailor Stars") has never been licensed for U.S release, so the sets being sold here through Amazon are bootlegs.don't bother getting this.

reviewerName: Dennis W. Benedict "If it's cute I will stare...
reviewText: In reading the previous reviews, particularly the ones claiming this Anime set to be a bootleg, I decided to respond.  As I said I do not own this Box Set, however, I do own ALL of the Sailor Moon DVD sets which includes:1.  Sailor Moon Season 1 & 2 complete -1 Box Sets. {Japanese Only}2.  Sailor Moon S (DVD 1-6) {Japanese and English}3.  Sailor Moon Super S (DVD 1-7) {Japanese and English)4.  Sailor Moon Sailor Stars (Complete Box Set)  {Japanese Only}Number 4 being the reason for this review of sorts.  I did not purchase Sailor Stars from Amazon, but I did get info from a wonderful person on Amazon's question and answer forum.  Not wanting to violate any of Amazon's rules :) I will choose not to mention where I bought Sailor Stars from unless Amazon specifically tells me I can :)Most notably on the box is the copy violation message.  This message is also on the DVD's.  However, there is no copyright date.  The picture quaility seems to have come from the older laserdisc style.  Menus are basic and there are no extras.  Most importantly is the fact that I thoroughly enjoyed the final saga in this wonderful anime.  Besides, Sailor Saturn gets to shine a little :)  And I would love to have a replica of her Silence Glaive.  Besides, if enough people buy these sets with Sailor Stars in them, and these sets do in fact happen to be bootlegs, then maybe we will finally get an officially licensed copy of the Sailor Moon Sailor Stars saga.  Rest assured I would definitely buy it :)
summary: I do not own this product per say but....

reviewText: Reported by ICv2 in April 2010, Toei is now offering all 200 episodes refurbished of the series for internatioal soliction( I don't know if they included the two specials and the three movies though(please have someone answer that part)).Sorry it came so late. And Funimation is looking into getting the rights to redub the series (don't know when they will get the rights, will update when they announce it).

reviewText: Buyer beware.  This release is not an official release.  In addition, there is hardly any description regarding what this actually consists of.  If you scroll through this item page, you'll note that there is a check box for "bootleg" in here, which would seem to denote this is a bootleg.
summary: This is a bootleg, not official release
